moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of lowering the target’s accuracy.

moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: On My Mark!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Flash Cannon
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.
